string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: "-The world isn't perfect. But it's there for us, doing the best it can..that's what makes it so damn beautiful. ~ Roy Mustang (Full Metal Alchemist)"
-Fear is not evil. It tells you what weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder. ~Gildarts Clive (Fairy Tail)
"-To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to happiness you could have. ~ Matsumoto Rangiku (Bleach)"
"-Whatever you lose, you'll find it again. But what you throw away you'll never get back. ~ Kenshin Himura (Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan)"
-People, who can’t throw something important away, can never hope to change anything. ~ Armin Arlert (Shingeki no Kyojin / Attack on Titan)
-I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don’t know what exactly I’ll be able to do for you, but I’ll always be by your side. ~ Kagome (InuYasha)
-Thinking you’re no-good and worthless is the worst thing you can do ~ Nobita (Doraemon)
-Don’t give up, there’s no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again! ~ Shintaro Midorima (Kuroko No Basket)
-When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred. ~ Uchiha Madara
"-Just be yourself and you'll be fine ~ Natsuki Takaya, (Fruits Basket)"
-Lying tears hurt others. Lying smiles hurt oneself ~ Ichirou Ohkouchi
-Power isn’t determined by your size, But the size of your heart and dreams! ~ Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)
-Dont let Nothing stop you. Fight for your goals even when it seems out of reach. ~ Ichigo Kurosaki (Bleach)
-Spoiling stories… is an unforgivable sin in this world. ~ Leo Baskerville Pandora Hearts
-There are things that cannot be taken back. But the world will keep on spinning whether you laugh or you cry. ~ Hikigaya Hachiman
"-Once you question your own belief, it's over. ~ Naruto Uzumaki"
-In order to exist you need a purpose, to exist without a purpose is the same as being dead. ~ Gaara
-The true substance of love lies in the act of howling words of love with a desperation of a man jumping into the high seas. ~ Osamu Dazai, A New Hamlet
"-I'll go, then rub it in the faces of everyone who said I couldn't. ~ Atsuko Ishizuka (a place further than the universe)"
-Never think the stars you see are all the stars there are. ~ Atsuko Ishizuka (a place further than the universe)
-Whether you’re sad, you’re a mess, or you’ve hit rock bottom, you still have TO PLAY! That’s how people like us survive ~ Kaori Miyazono
-Talent is something you bloom, Instinct is something you polish. ~ Oikawa Tooru, Haikyūu
"-I don't care if no one like me, I wasn't created in this world to entertain everyone. ~ Oreki from Hyouka"
-People are born weak, but we have the freedom to defy our weaknesses and struggle to change ourselves ~ Yoshida Shouyou
-I dont exist. But even if I do thats still none of your business ~ Mei Misaki
"-If you don't want a sarcastic answer, don't ask a stupid question. ~ Oreki Houtarou"
"-Don't change so people will like you. Be yourself and the right people will like the real you. ~ Oreki Houtarou"
-There are only two paths you can choose. You can sit quietly and be selected out of this world, or you can adapt and change! ~ Gai Tsutsugami
-Once I’m dead, I won’t even be able to remember you. So I’ll win, no matter what. I’ll live, no matter what! ~ Mikasa Ackerman
-Appearances rarely share the whole truth ~ Selim Bradly Pride
"-You can spill drinks on me, even spit on me. I'll just laugh about it. But If you dare to hurt my friends.. I won't forgive you! ~ Shanks"
"-When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back. It's not like somebody's gonna save you if you start babbling excuses. ~ Roronoa Zoro"
"-I don't wanna live a thousand years. If I just live through today, that'll be enough. ~ Portgas D. Ace"
-In case we become candles, I want to have a nice pose ~ Roronoa Zoro
"-I'm sorry. I never pray to god. ~ Roronoa Zoro"
-Give a kid a smoke and he’ll be happy for a day. Teach him how to smoke… he’ll be happy for his whole shortened life. ~ Eikichi Onizuka
-Sometimes violence is the only way to get the message across. ~ Eikichi Onizuka
-A brat who is afraid to be hurt isn’t qualified to love someone. ~ Eikichi Onizuka
-There’s no gender distinction among the bad. ~ Eikichi Onizuka
-Some lies are necessary for giving children dreams. ~ Shimura Tae (Gintama)
-I suppose it’s not so bad that an old friend is the same as ever. ~ Kotarou Katsura (Gintama)
-Whether doing good or evil, I will be the boss. ~ Kagura (Gintama)
-No matter whether you win or not, there’s no meaning to war. ~ Gintoki Sakata (Gintama)
-You yourself have to change first, or nothing will change for you. ~ Gintoki Sakata (Gintama)
-Life is like a mountain – you can say you’ve reached the top, but only after climbing back down. ~ Gintoki Sakata (Gintama)
